alex-lau.title: Alex Lau
alex-lau.description: Blockchain Open Source Advisor of CyberMiles, Webank and TruBuzz; R&D Engineering Consultant of SUSE Linux Enterprise Storage

haggen-so.title: Dr. Haggen So
haggen-so.description: Founder and President of Hong Kong Creative Open Technology Association; Former Project Manager of the Creative Commons Hong Kong and still an active volunteer of the local movement.

jon-phillips.title: Jon Phillips

label.description:
LikeCoin protocol is a movement to redistribute the income generated by contents licensed under Creative Commons. Our contents are free to use and our source codes are open source on Github.

Our presentation in Creative Commons Summit 2018

gettingStart.title: Getting Start
gettingStart.description: Welcome to join the movement. LikeCoin aims to reinvent the Like by realigning creativity and reward. In like.co, you are not only can buy and send LikeCoin, but also earn LikeCoin by participating in the LIKE ecology. View your Like ID payment page, watch introduction video and join our telegram group to get 3 LikeCoin!
gettingStart.taskOnepager: Take a look at our one pager
gettingStart.taskPaymentPage: Take a look at your payment page

inviteFriend.title: Invite a friend to join LikeCoin
inviteFriend.description: Invite friend (or friends) to join us, 8 LIKE for both you and your friends.

joinTokenSale.title: Join Token Sale
joinTokenSale.description: Join token sale now and get 100 LIKE bonus
joinTokenSale.subDescription:
And don't forget the referral bonus, it can be huge! Every time you participate in token sale, you and your referrer will both get 2.5% additional token bonus too, NO UPPER LIMIT!

Note: If you join the token sale through third parties, e.g. MyEthShop, this mission will not be completed. As a result, you will not get bonus for this mission.

wordpress.title: Install LikeCoin plugin
wordpress.content: {installWp} to enable new LikeButtons in your posts by just one click.  The plugin is nothing to do with client browser’s computational power, all you need are reader’s Likes. No annoying ads on the button, it is your own brand. {wpInstruction}
wordpress.caption: LikeButton will show on your post after installed the {plugin}

medium.title: Adding your LikeButton
medium.content: It’s easy to insert the LikeButton into your Medium articles.  Just insert your LikeButton URL into your articles with the format below:
medium.caption: Simply type your LikeCoin link and press ‘Enter’ in your story

oice.title: Connect with LikeCoin ID
oice.content: Bind your LikeCoin ID in {oiceWebsite}. The LikeButton will appear automatically on your oice visual novel after you have bind your LikeCoin ID with your oice account. {oiceInstruction}
oice.caption: LikeButton will show aside with your story

title.slogan: Get Rewarded by Reader’s Likes NOW

label.earn: Add the reinvented LikeButton to your creative contents to turn readers' Likes into passive income. Keep connected with your fans, promote your own brand with a nicely designed UI.
label.poc: With the focus on rewarding content creators, LikeCoin (LIKE) measures the "creativity" of creative contents and let creators make passive income in LIKE with their creative contents according to the Likes they get. We call the mechanism Proof of Creativity, or PoC.
label.campaign: Act immediately to earn LIKE by your creative works. There are three platforms that support the LikeButton now: WordPress-powered sites, Medium and oice.
label.enroll: Add the LikeButton to your creative works; get Likes from your fans. It’s that simple! We are giving out millions of LikeCoin per month to reward creators. Let’s go ahead for the bonus.

label.thanks: Thank you for becoming a Content Civics
label.createToEnjoyContent: Create or connect to your LikeCoin ID before you enjoy LikeContent and give you like to 100+ LikeWriter.
label.buildPlaceForYou: Together, we’re building a different kind of place on the internet: one designed for you, not for advertisers.
label.readAndAppreciate: Read and appreciate the excellent work from the top creators

button.howToCreateID: How to create a LikeCoin ID
